title: Why do Bagels have holes?
description:
Want to do some real science right at home? Our friends at MEL Science have you covered with their amazing monthly science kits -- and a special discount for our Smartypants. Use code SMARTY at MEL Science or just go to this link and get started doing science, every month, right at home!

Who Smarted's? Sea Camp Live starts October 18th - and signup closes soon. Click here to join now!

Bagels are one of the most popular things to eat in the morning. But what makes a bagel so special? Are they just donuts without the sugar? Pretzels without the twist? And what's with the hole? Find out all this and more about bagels on today's episode of Who Smarted?

Quickest way to hear YOUR name on Who Smarted? Leave us a great 5-star review on Apple podcasts, include your first name, and you might hear yours on an upcoming episode.

For free home science activities and helpful stuff for classrooms and homeschool sign-up for our free newsletter at www.WhoSmarted.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
